1. Du rar upp alla eventuella rar filer.
2. Du mounter dom eventuella .bin .iso filerna du får ur rar filerna.
3. Du installerar spelet
4. Du lägger in eventuella crack filer och serials i spelet och spelar. Good luck.

To all you that can't the polish language. Just Install the game, then go to the install directory\data\ and copy the string folder to desktop. Then install the polish crack....when that's done you just replace the new string folder with the one you copied earlier.. :) Now you will have english language.. but .. you can't make any changes on the car setup. :(
